onBoardingHeaders.personalInfoTxt: Let's get familiar - fill out the form to complete your account on MyHAQQ.
onBoardingHeaders.firmInfoTxt: Please tell us more about the firm you work with.
onBoardingHeaders.chooseExperienceTxt: MyHAQQ can you help you get started, and it fully digitize. Your choice.
onBoardingHeaders.digitalizePracticeTxt: Thank you for choosing MyHAQQ. Fill out the details below to successfully digitize your practice.
onBoardingHeaders.professionalInfoTxt: Tell us about the country jurisdictions where you are allowed to practice as a legal consultant, lawyer, appellate lawyer, and cassation lawyer. This information will be publicly displayed on your HAQQ social account, and will help clients choose to work with you.
onBoardingHeaders.professionalExperienceTxt: Tell us more about your professional experience. This information will be publicly displayed on your HAQQ Social Account, and will help clients choose to work with you.
onBoardingHeaders.educationalHistoryTxt: Tell us more about your educational background. This information will be publicly displayed on your HAQQ Social Account, and will help clients choose to work with you.
onBoardingHeaders.externalInfoTxt: Tell us more about your achievements. This information will be publicly displayed on your HAQQ Social Account, and will help clients choose to work with you.
onBoardingHeaders.thankyoupage: Thank you for completing your profile. You can now enjoy a unique experience.

firmEmailDescription: The email that you type will become the email that owns the firm account, with the ability to edit information, add administrators, and much else. If you are the firm owner, please write your own email again. Thank you.
